snippet: Brent Seabrook scored on a two-on-one break in overtime, and the Chicago Blackhawks beat the Columbus Blue Jackets.
abstract: Chicago Blackhawks beat Columbus Blue Jackets, 4-3.
lead_paragraph: Brent Seabrook scored on a two-on-one break in overtime, and the Chicago Blackhawks beat the Columbus Blue Jackets.

headline.seo: Blackhawks Beat Blue Jackets and Extend Streak to 21 Games With a Point
headline.main: Blackhawks Extend Streak to 21 Games With a Point
